accordionBody.heading: headingOne
accordionBody.desc: Online tutoring platforms cover a wide range of subjects and levels, providing opportunities to teach anything from academic subjects to language learning, test preparation, and specialized skills.

accordionBody.heading: headingTwo
accordionBody.desc: Both tutors and students can enjoy the convenience of online tutoring. There's no need to commute to a physical location, saving time and money on transportation.

accordionBody.heading: headingThree
accordionBody.desc: Online tutoring breaks down geographical barriers, allowing you to reach students from around the world. This expands your potential client base and increases opportunities for tutoring sessions.

AccordionThree.title: Have a Question with
AccordionThree.subTitle: Histudy University?
AccordionThree.description: Lorem Ipsum is simply dummy text of the printing and typesetting industry. Lorem Ipsum has been the industry's standard dummy text ever since

faqBody.heading: headingOne3
faqBody.desc: EET English LMS is an online learning platform designed to help users improve their English language skills through interactive courses, practice exercises, and expert guidance.

faqBody.heading: headingTwo3
faqBody.accordionTitle: How do I sign up for EET English LMS?
faqBody.desc: To sign up, simply visit our website, click on the "Sign Up" button, and fill out the registration form with your details. You’ll receive a confirmation email to activate your account.

faqBody.heading: headingThree3
faqBody.accordionTitle: What types of courses are available?
faqBody.desc: We offer a wide range of courses catering to different proficiency levels, from beginner to advanced. Our courses cover grammar, vocabulary, speaking, listening, reading, and writing skills, as well as specialized courses for business English and exam preparation.

faqBody.heading: headingFour3
faqBody.accordionTitle: Is there a free trial available?
faqBody.desc: Yes, we offer a free trial period for new users to explore our platform and experience the quality of our courses before committing to a subscription plan.

faqBody.heading: headingFive3
faqBody.accordionTitle: How can I interact with instructors or ask questions?
faqBody.desc: Our platform includes a dedicated forum and messaging system where you can interact with instructors and fellow learners, ask questions, and receive feedback.

faqBody.heading: headingSix3
faqBody.accordionTitle: Are there any certificates offered upon course completion?
faqBody.desc: Yes, upon completing a course, you will receive a certificate of completion that you can download and share to showcase your achievement.

faqBody.heading: headingSeven3
faqBody.accordionTitle: What kind of support is available if I have technical issues or questions?
faqBody.desc: We offer 24/7 customer support via email and live chat to assist you with any technical issues or questions you may have.

faqBody.heading: headingEight3
faqBody.accordionTitle: Can I cancel my subscription anytime?
faqBody.desc: Yes, you can cancel your subscription at any time through your account settings. If you cancel, you will still have access to the platform until the end of your current billing period.

faqBody2.heading: headingOne4
faqBody2.accordionTitle: How much does it cost to use EET English LMS?
faqBody2.desc: We offer several subscription plans to fit different budgets, including monthly, quarterly, and annual options. Detailed pricing information is available on our website under the “Pricing” section.

faqBody2.heading: headingTwo4
faqBody2.accordionTitle: Can I access the courses on mobile devices?
faqBody2.desc: Absolutely! Our platform is fully responsive and accessible on all devices, including smartphones, tablets, and desktops, allowing you to learn anytime, anywhere.

faqBody2.heading: headingThree4
faqBody2.accordionTitle: How do I track my learning progress?
faqBody2.desc: You can track your progress through your personal dashboard, which provides insights into your completed lessons, quiz scores, and overall performance.

faqBody2.heading: headingFour4
faqBody2.accordionTitle: What happens if I miss a lesson or need to pause my learning?
faqBody2.desc: Our LMS allows you to learn at your own pace. If you miss a lesson, you can always go back and review it. Additionally, you can pause your subscription and resume it whenever you're ready to continue learning.

faqBody2.heading: headingFive4
faqBody2.accordionTitle: How do I reset my password if I forget it?
faqBody2.desc: If you forget your password, click on the "Forgot Password?" link on the login page, enter your registered email address, and follow the instructions to reset your password.

faqBody2.heading: headingSix4
faqBody2.accordionTitle: Does EET English LMS offer any discounts or promotions?
faqBody2.desc: We occasionally offer discounts and promotions, especially for new users or during special events. Be sure to subscribe to our newsletter to stay updated on the latest offers.

faqBody2.heading: headingSeven4
faqBody2.accordionTitle: How can I provide feedback or suggest improvements for the platform?
faqBody2.desc: We welcome user feedback! You can provide feedback or suggest improvements directly through the platform’s feedback form or by contacting our support team.
